# mrSampleOverlap

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of mrSampleOverlap is to estimate bias due to participant overlap in Mendelian Randomization studies. This package implements code described in Burgess et. al. 2016 (DOI: [10.1002/gepi.21998](https://doi.org/10.1002/gepi.21998))

## Installation

You can install the development version of mrSampleOverlap from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mglev1n/mrSampleOverlap")
```
